name: Day At Work!
description:
Note: Please Play In Full Screen.

Day At Work!

Play as a lazy employee on the edge of being fired. Run around the office, finishing work and drinking coffee in order to keep your job.

Made For Vimjam 2.0

Controls:

[WASD] or [Arrow keys] = Move

[Space] = Fill Document

   

Coffee:  On the left of the screen is your coffee meter, this decreases over time. Once the coffee meter reaches zero you’ll fall asleep. The only way to keep your coffee meter up is to drink coffee, an unhealthy amount of coffee.

Work: Documents are dotted around the office, to fill them in you must walk up to them and repeatedly press the space bar. (Yes, very realistic, I know.)  If your able to fill in 10 documents your boss may turn a full 180 and promote you instead of firing you.
